mapper.select: select FULFILLMENT_ID, ORDER_ID, ORDER_TYPE, STATUS, IDENTITY_ID, LAST_UPDATED_DATE, LAST_UPDATED_BY, EXP_START_DATE, EXP_END_DATE, APPOINTMENT_ID, PRE_WIRING_START_DATE, PRE_WIRING_END_DATE, PRE_SITE_CHECK_START_DATE, PRE_SITE_CHECK_END_DATE, GROUP_ID, FAMILY_ID, NEW_GROUP_ID, NEW_IDENTITY_ID, CREATED_DATE, LOG_ID, LOG_DATE, NEW_FAMILY_ID, DDI_LEVEL, CUST_ID, PORT_FLAG, NN, RNO, DNO, CNI, CNI_DATE, CHG_OVER_START_TIME, CHG_OVER_END_TIME, ACCOUNT_NUMBER, REF_SERIAL_NO, BMO from BES_FFM_ORDER_HIST where FULFILLMENT_ID = #{fulfillmentId}
mapper.insert: insert into BES_FFM_ORDER_HIST(ORDER_ID, ORDER_TYPE, STATUS, IDENTITY_ID, LAST_UPDATED_DATE, LAST_UPDATED_BY, EXP_START_DATE, EXP_END_DATE, APPOINTMENT_ID, PRE_WIRING_START_DATE, PRE_WIRING_END_DATE, PRE_SITE_CHECK_START_DATE, PRE_SITE_CHECK_END_DATE, GROUP_ID, FAMILY_ID, NEW_GROUP_ID, NEW_IDENTITY_ID, CREATED_DATE, LOG_DATE, NEW_FAMILY_ID, DDI_LEVEL, CUST_ID, PORT_FLAG, NN, RNO, DNO, CNI, CNI_DATE, CHG_OVER_START_TIME, CHG_OVER_END_TIME, ACCOUNT_NUMBER, REF_SERIAL_NO, BMO) values (#{orderId}, #{orderType}, #{status}, #{identityId}, #{lastUpdatedDate}, #{lastUpdatedBy}, #{expStartDate}, #{expEndDate}, #{appointmentId}, #{preWiringStartDate}, #{preWiringEndDate}, #{preSiteCheckStartDate}, #{preSiteCheckEndDate}, #{groupId}, #{familyId}, #{newGroupId}, #{newIdentityId}, #{createdDate}, #{logDate}, #{newFamilyId}, #{ddiLevel}, #{custId}, #{portFlag}, #{nn}, #{rno}, #{dno}, #{cni}, #{cniDate}, #{chgOverStartTime}, #{chgOverEndTime}, #{accountNumber}, #{refSerialNo}, #{bmo})

insert into BES_FFM_ORDER_HIST(ORDER_ID, ORDER_TYPE, STATUS, IDENTITY_ID, LAST_UPDATED_DATE, LAST_UPDATED_BY, EXP_START_DATE, EXP_END_DATE, APPOINTMENT_ID, PRE_WIRING_START_DATE, PRE_WIRING_END_DATE, PRE_SITE_CHECK_START_DATE, PRE_SITE_CHECK_END_DATE, GROUP_ID, FAMILY_ID, NEW_GROUP_ID, NEW_IDENTITY_ID, CREATED_DATE, LOG_DATE, NEW_FAMILY_ID, DDI_LEVEL, CUST_ID, PORT_FLAG, NN, RNO, DNO, CNI, CNI_DATE, CHG_OVER_START_TIME, CHG_OVER_END_TIME, ACCOUNT_NUMBER, REF_SERIAL_NO, BMO) values
(#{entity.orderId}, #{entity.orderType}, #{entity.status}, #{entity.identityId}, #{entity.lastUpdatedDate}, #{entity.lastUpdatedBy}, #{entity.expStartDate}, #{entity.expEndDate}, #{entity.appointmentId}, #{entity.preWiringStartDate}, #{entity.preWiringEndDate}, #{entity.preSiteCheckStartDate}, #{entity.preSiteCheckEndDate}, #{entity.groupId}, #{entity.familyId}, #{entity.newGroupId}, #{entity.newIdentityId}, #{entity.createdDate}, #{entity.logDate}, #{entity.newFamilyId}, #{entity.ddiLevel}, #{entity.custId}, #{entity.portFlag}, #{entity.nn}, #{entity.rno}, #{entity.dno}, #{entity.cni}, #{entity.cniDate}, #{entity.chgOverStartTime}, #{entity.chgOverEndTime}, #{entity.accountNumber}, #{entity.refSerialNo}, #{entity.bmo})

insert into BES_FFM_ORDER_HIST(ORDER_ID, ORDER_TYPE, STATUS, IDENTITY_ID, LAST_UPDATED_DATE, LAST_UPDATED_BY, EXP_START_DATE, EXP_END_DATE, APPOINTMENT_ID, PRE_WIRING_START_DATE, PRE_WIRING_END_DATE, PRE_SITE_CHECK_START_DATE, PRE_SITE_CHECK_END_DATE, GROUP_ID, FAMILY_ID, NEW_GROUP_ID, NEW_IDENTITY_ID, CREATED_DATE, LOG_DATE, NEW_FAMILY_ID, DDI_LEVEL, CUST_ID, PORT_FLAG, NN, RNO, DNO, CNI, CNI_DATE, CHG_OVER_START_TIME, CHG_OVER_END_TIME, ACCOUNT_NUMBER, REF_SERIAL_NO, BMO) values
(#{entity.orderId}, #{entity.orderType}, #{entity.status}, #{entity.identityId}, #{entity.lastUpdatedDate}, #{entity.lastUpdatedBy}, #{entity.expStartDate}, #{entity.expEndDate}, #{entity.appointmentId}, #{entity.preWiringStartDate}, #{entity.preWiringEndDate}, #{entity.preSiteCheckStartDate}, #{entity.preSiteCheckEndDate}, #{entity.groupId}, #{entity.familyId}, #{entity.newGroupId}, #{entity.newIdentityId}, #{entity.createdDate}, #{entity.logDate}, #{entity.newFamilyId}, #{entity.ddiLevel}, #{entity.custId}, #{entity.portFlag}, #{entity.nn}, #{entity.rno}, #{entity.dno}, #{entity.cni}, #{entity.cniDate}, #{entity.chgOverStartTime}, #{entity.chgOverEndTime}, #{entity.accountNumber}, #{entity.refSerialNo}, #{entity.bmo})
on duplicate key update ORDER_ID = values(ORDER_ID), ORDER_TYPE = values(ORDER_TYPE), STATUS = values(STATUS), IDENTITY_ID = values(IDENTITY_ID), LAST_UPDATED_DATE = values(LAST_UPDATED_DATE), LAST_UPDATED_BY = values(LAST_UPDATED_BY), EXP_START_DATE = values(EXP_START_DATE), EXP_END_DATE = values(EXP_END_DATE), APPOINTMENT_ID = values(APPOINTMENT_ID), PRE_WIRING_START_DATE = values(PRE_WIRING_START_DATE), PRE_WIRING_END_DATE = values(PRE_WIRING_END_DATE), PRE_SITE_CHECK_START_DATE = values(PRE_SITE_CHECK_START_DATE), PRE_SITE_CHECK_END_DATE = values(PRE_SITE_CHECK_END_DATE), GROUP_ID = values(GROUP_ID), FAMILY_ID = values(FAMILY_ID), NEW_GROUP_ID = values(NEW_GROUP_ID), NEW_IDENTITY_ID = values(NEW_IDENTITY_ID), CREATED_DATE = values(CREATED_DATE), LOG_DATE = values(LOG_DATE), NEW_FAMILY_ID = values(NEW_FAMILY_ID), DDI_LEVEL = values(DDI_LEVEL), CUST_ID = values(CUST_ID), PORT_FLAG = values(PORT_FLAG), NN = values(NN), RNO = values(RNO), DNO = values(DNO), CNI = values(CNI), CNI_DATE = values(CNI_DATE), CHG_OVER_START_TIME = values(CHG_OVER_START_TIME), CHG_OVER_END_TIME = values(CHG_OVER_END_TIME), ACCOUNT_NUMBER = values(ACCOUNT_NUMBER), REF_SERIAL_NO = values(REF_SERIAL_NO), BMO = values(BMO)
mapper.update:
update BES_FFM_ORDER_HIST
ORDER_ID = #{orderId},
ORDER_TYPE = #{orderType},
STATUS = #{status},
IDENTITY_ID = #{identityId},
LAST_UPDATED_DATE = #{lastUpdatedDate},
LAST_UPDATED_BY = #{lastUpdatedBy},
EXP_START_DATE = #{expStartDate},
EXP_END_DATE = #{expEndDate},
APPOINTMENT_ID = #{appointmentId},
PRE_WIRING_START_DATE = #{preWiringStartDate},
PRE_WIRING_END_DATE = #{preWiringEndDate},
PRE_SITE_CHECK_START_DATE = #{preSiteCheckStartDate},
PRE_SITE_CHECK_END_DATE = #{preSiteCheckEndDate},
GROUP_ID = #{groupId},
FAMILY_ID = #{familyId},
NEW_GROUP_ID = #{newGroupId},
NEW_IDENTITY_ID = #{newIdentityId},
CREATED_DATE = #{createdDate},
LOG_DATE = #{logDate},
NEW_FAMILY_ID = #{newFamilyId},
DDI_LEVEL = #{ddiLevel},
CUST_ID = #{custId},
PORT_FLAG = #{portFlag},
NN = #{nn},
RNO = #{rno},
DNO = #{dno},
CNI = #{cni},
CNI_DATE = #{cniDate},
CHG_OVER_START_TIME = #{chgOverStartTime},
CHG_OVER_END_TIME = #{chgOverEndTime},
ACCOUNT_NUMBER = #{accountNumber},
REF_SERIAL_NO = #{refSerialNo},
BMO = #{bmo},
where FULFILLMENT_ID = #{fulfillmentId}
